author: nero_eth
content:
Just got to reviewing this PR and it looks great!
One thing that could still be added is the case where the same transaction index appears twice with conflicting post-state values. We test duplicated indices only by having the exact same change-list entry but not with different entries having the same index. 
My thinking was that a client that only checks full-entry equality (rather than index-only uniqueness) could theoretically pass these new tests but still be wrong.
